airhockeyjava.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • airhockeyjava.game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Top-level class for the game. Used for both simulated and actual games. Simulated games will simply need to swap out the detection module with the mocked version.
    Author:
    Joshua Segeren

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Game.GameTypeEnum
      Enumeration type to distinguish simulated and real-world games.

    • Field Detail

      • keyToActionNameMap

        private static final java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> keyToActionNameMap
        Set up maps for key bindings. Key -> action name, then action name -> action handler. This is considered the preferred mechanism for handling key inputs versus the KeyListener. Works equally on all platforms: Windows, Mac, Linux.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Entry-point application method. Starts and runs a game of air hockey. Currently terminates when game is finished. Void return.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException
